alert.note: Alert for Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:13PM CDT until July 10 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SMITH...EASTERN FRANKLIN AND WEBSTER COUNTIES... At 913 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bladen to 7 miles southeast of Campbell to near Franklin, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Red Cloud, Campbell, Bladen, Riverton, Cowles and Inavale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
